value.title: Fill up/ down with conditions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to fill up or down based on conditions. I am going to show you two ways to do it, you pick the one need :)  Chapters 00:00 Intro 01:00 First solution using M language 02:50 Second solution using the UI Done! value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. In this video we will show you how to display empty categories or show
